products.title: Splash Classic Blue 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. The colour of 2020, opt for classic blue to instill a calming tone within your space. Their vertical blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Thermatex Classic White Vertical Blind
products.description: This classic white vertical blind is a lovely bright white and perfect for keeping the heat in. As well as reflecting up to 78% of the heat back into the room, it will also allow some light to gently filter through. This fabric is very robust; it's washable and also suitable this classic white vertical blind is a lovely bright white and perfect for keeping the heat in.
